trans-unit.source: Encapsulates a 3-by-3 affine matrix that represents a geometric transform.
trans-unit.target: 封裝代表幾何轉換的 3 乘 3 仿射矩陣。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] you can store an affine transformation in a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix> object.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]，您可以儲存在仿射轉換<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix>物件。

trans-unit.source: Because the third column of a matrix that represents an affine transformation is always (0, 0, 1), you specify only the six numbers in the first two columns when you construct a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix> object.
trans-unit.target: 因為代表仿射轉換矩陣的第三個資料行一律是 （0，0，1），在建構時，在前兩個資料行中指定的六個數字<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix>物件。

trans-unit.source: The statement `Matrix myMatrix = new Matrix(0, 1, -1, 0, 3, 4)` constructs the matrix shown in the following figure.
trans-unit.target: 陳述式`Matrix myMatrix = new Matrix(0, 1, -1, 0, 3, 4)`建構，如下圖所示的矩陣。

trans-unit.source: ![Transformations](~/add/media/aboutgdip05-art10.gif "Transformations")
trans-unit.target: ![轉換](~/add/media/aboutgdip05-art10.gif "轉換")

trans-unit.source: Composite Transformations
trans-unit.target: 複合轉換

trans-unit.source: A composite transformation is a sequence of transformations, one followed by the other.
trans-unit.target: 複合轉換是一串轉換，後面接著另一個。

trans-unit.source: Consider the matrices and transformations in the following list:
trans-unit.target: 請考慮下列清單中的轉換與矩陣：

trans-unit.source: Matrix A
trans-unit.target: 矩陣 A

trans-unit.source: Rotate 90 degrees
trans-unit.target: 旋轉 90 度

trans-unit.source: Matrix B
trans-unit.target: 矩陣 B

trans-unit.source: Scale by a factor of 2 in the x direction
trans-unit.target: 在 x 方向的 2 倍縮放

trans-unit.source: Matrix C
trans-unit.target: 矩陣 C

trans-unit.source: Translate 3 units in the y direction
trans-unit.target: 轉換在 y 方向的 3 個單位

trans-unit.source: If we start with the point (2, 1) — represented by the matrix [2 1 1] — and multiply by A, then B, then C, the point (2, 1) will undergo the three transformations in the order listed.
trans-unit.target: 如果我們開始點 （2，1） — 矩陣 [2 1 1] 表示的 — 乘以 A，然後 B，則 C 中，點 （2，1） 將會進行三種轉換中列出的順序。

trans-unit.source: Rather than store the three parts of the composite transformation in three separate matrices, you can multiply A, B, and C together to get a single 3×3 matrix that stores the entire composite transformation.
trans-unit.target: 而是比儲存在三個個別的矩陣中的複合轉換的三個部分，您可以將 A、 B 和 C 取得儲存整個複合轉換的單一 3 × 3 矩陣。

trans-unit.source: Suppose ABC = D. Then a point multiplied by D gives the same result as a point multiplied by A, then B, then C.
trans-unit.target: 假設 ABC = d。然後乘以 D 點會給予發生相同的結果為點乘以 A，然後 B，然後 c。

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows the matrices A, B, C, and D.
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示矩陣 A、 B、 C 和 d。

trans-unit.source: ![Transformations](~/add/media/aboutgdip05-art12.gif "Transformations")
trans-unit.target: ![轉換](~/add/media/aboutgdip05-art12.gif "轉換")

trans-unit.source: The fact that the matrix of a composite transformation can be formed by multiplying the individual transformation matrices means that any sequence of affine transformations can be stored in a single <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix> object.
trans-unit.target: 可以在個別的轉換矩陣乘以格式正確的複合的轉換矩陣的事實表示仿射轉換的任何序列，可以儲存在單一<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix>物件。

trans-unit.source: The order of a composite transformation is important.
trans-unit.target: 複合轉換順序很重要。

trans-unit.source: In general, rotate, then scale, then translate is not the same as scale, then rotate, then translate.
trans-unit.target: 一般情況下，旋轉，再調整，然後轉換並不相同為小數位數，然後旋轉、，然後轉換。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the order of matrix multiplication is important.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，矩陣乘法的順序很重要。

trans-unit.source: In general, ABC is not the same as BAC.
trans-unit.target: 一般情況下，ABC 不是不相同。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix> class provides several methods for building a composite transformation: <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix.Multiply%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix.Rotate%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix.RotateAt%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix.Scale%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix.Shear%2A>, and <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix.Translate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix>類別提供數種方法來建立複合的轉換： <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix.Multiply%2A>， <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix.Rotate%2A>， <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix.RotateAt%2A>， <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix.Scale%2A>， <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix.Shear%2A>，和<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix.Translate%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates the matrix of a composite transformation that first rotates 30 degrees, then scales by a factor of 2 in the y direction, and then translates 5 units in the x direction:
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立先旋轉 30 度，則 y 方向的 2 倍縮放並再將轉譯 x 方向的 5 個單位的複合轉換的矩陣：

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> class as the identity matrix.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> 類別的新執行個體做為身分識別矩陣。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure that represents the rectangle to be transformed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 結構，代表要轉換的矩形。

trans-unit.source: An array of three <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> structures that represents the points of a parallelogram to which the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the rectangle is to be transformed.
trans-unit.target: 三個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> 結構的陣列，這個結構表示矩形左上角、右上角和左下角的要轉換平行四邊形的點。

trans-unit.source: The lower-right corner of the parallelogram is implied by the first three corners.
trans-unit.target: 前三個角指示平行四邊形的右下角。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> class to the geometric transform defined by the specified rectangle and array of points.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> 類別的新執行個體至指定的矩形和點陣列所定義的幾何轉換。

trans-unit.source: This method initializes the new Matrix such that it represents the geometric transform that maps the rectangle specified by the `rect` parameter to the parallelogram defined by the three points in the `plgpts` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 例如，其表示的幾何轉換對應所指定的矩形，這個方法會初始化新矩陣`rect`參數中的三個點所定義的平行四邊形`plgpts`參數。

trans-unit.source: The upper-left corner of the rectangle is mapped to the first point in the `plgpts` array, the upper-right corner is mapped to the second point, and the lower-left corner is mapped to the third point.
trans-unit.target: 矩形左上角對應中的第一個點`plgpts`，右上角會對應到第二個點，以及陣列的左下角會對應到第三個點。

trans-unit.source: The lower-right point of the parallelogram is implied by the first three.
trans-unit.target: 前三個部分都會隱含的平行四邊形的右下角端點。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> structure that represents the rectangle to be transformed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> 結構，代表要轉換的矩形。

trans-unit.source: An array of three <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structures that represents the points of a parallelogram to which the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the rectangle is to be transformed.
trans-unit.target: 三個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> 結構的陣列，這個結構表示矩形左上角、右上角和左下角的要轉換平行四邊形的點。

trans-unit.source: The lower-right corner of the parallelogram is implied by the first three corners.
trans-unit.target: 前三個角指示平行四邊形的右下角。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> class to the geometric transform defined by the specified rectangle and array of points.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> 類別的新執行個體至指定的矩形和點陣列所定義的幾何轉換。

trans-unit.source: This method initializes the new <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix> such that it represents the geometric transform that maps the rectangle specified by the `rect` parameter to the parallelogram defined by the three points in the `plgpts` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會初始化新<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix>，它代表對應所指定的矩形的幾何轉換`rect`參數中的三個點所定義的平行四邊形`plgpts`參數。

trans-unit.source: The upper-left corner of the rectangle is mapped to the first point in the `plgpts` array, the upper-right corner is mapped to the second point, and the lower-left corner is mapped to the third point.
trans-unit.target: 矩形左上角對應中的第一個點`plgpts`，右上角會對應到第二個點，以及陣列的左下角會對應到第三個點。

trans-unit.source: The lower-right point of the parallelogram is implied by the first three.
trans-unit.target: 前三個部分都會隱含的平行四邊形的右下角端點。

trans-unit.source: The value in the first row and first column of the new <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" />.
trans-unit.target: 新 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> 的第一列第一欄中的值。

trans-unit.source: The value in the first row and second column of the new <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" />.
trans-unit.target: 新 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> 的第一列第二欄中的值。

trans-unit.source: The value in the second row and first column of the new <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" />.
trans-unit.target: 新 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> 的第二列第一欄中的值。

trans-unit.source: The value in the second row and second column of the new <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" />.
trans-unit.target: 新 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> 的第二列第一欄中的值。

trans-unit.source: The value in the third row and first column of the new <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" />.
trans-unit.target: 新 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> 的第三列第一欄中的值。

trans-unit.source: The value in the third row and second column of the new <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" />.
trans-unit.target: 新 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> 的第三列第二欄中的值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> class with the specified elements.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的項目，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Creates an exact copy of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" />.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> 的完全相同複本。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> that this method creates.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法建立的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" />。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" />.
trans-unit.target: 釋放此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> 所使用的所有資源。

trans-unit.source: Calling `Dispose` allows the resources used by this <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix> object to be reallocated for other purposes.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫`Dispose`允許所使用的資源<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix>都重新配置用於其他用途的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of floating-point values that represents the elements of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得浮點值的陣列，該陣列代表這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> 的元素。

trans-unit.source: An array of floating-point values that represents the elements of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" />.
trans-unit.target: 浮點值的陣列，代表這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> 的元素。

trans-unit.source: The elements m11, m12, m21, m22, dx, and dy of the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix> are represented by the values in the array in that order.
trans-unit.target: 項目 m11、 m12、 m21、 m22、 dx 和 dy 的<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix>都由該順序陣列中的值。

trans-unit.source: The object to test.
trans-unit.target: 要測試的物件。

trans-unit.source: Tests whether the specified object is a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> and is identical to this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" />.
trans-unit.target: 測試指定的物件是否為 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" />，並且和這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> 相同。

trans-unit.source: This method returns <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="obj" /> is the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> identical to this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="obj" /> 是與這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> 相同的指定 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" />，則這個方法會傳回 <see langword="true" />；否則會傳回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Allows an object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 在記憶體回收開始前，允許物件嘗試釋放資源，並執行其他清除作業。

trans-unit.source: Returns a hash code.
trans-unit.target: 傳回雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: The hash code for this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> 的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: Inverts this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" />, if it is invertible.
trans-unit.target: 如果可反轉，則反轉這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a matrix and inverts it:
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立矩陣，並將它反轉：

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> is the identity matrix.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指示這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> 是否為身分識別矩陣。

trans-unit.source: This property is <see langword="true" /> if this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> is identity; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> 為身分識別，則這個屬性為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> is invertible.
trans-unit.target: 取得指出這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> 是否可反轉的值。

trans-unit.source: This property is <see langword="true" /> if this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> is invertible; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> 為可反轉的，則這個屬性為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Multiplies this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> by the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> by prepending the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" />.
trans-unit.target: 藉由將指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> 附加在前面，將這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> 乘以指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> by which this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> is to be multiplied.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> 要乘以的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" />。

trans-unit.source: Multiplies this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> by the matrix specified in the <paramref name="matrix" /> parameter, by prepending the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" />.
trans-unit.target: 藉由將指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> 附加在前面，將這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> 乘以 <paramref name="matrix" /> 參數中所指定的矩陣。

trans-unit.source: For an example, see <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix.Multiply%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需範例，請參閱 <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix.Multiply%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> by which this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> is to be multiplied.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> 要乘以的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder" /> that represents the order of the multiplication.
trans-unit.target: 代表乘法順序的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder" />。

trans-unit.source: Multiplies this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> by the matrix specified in the <paramref name="matrix" /> parameter, and in the order specified in the <paramref name="order" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 將這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> 乘以 <paramref name="matrix" /> 參數中所指定的矩陣，並且依據 <paramref name="order" /> 參數中所指定的順序。

trans-unit.source: If the specified order is <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder.Prepend>, this <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix> is multiplied by the specified matrix in a prepended order.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的順序是<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder.Prepend>，這個<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix>乘以預留的順序指定的矩陣。

trans-unit.source: If the specified order is <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder.Append>, this <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix> is multiplied by the specified matrix in an appended order.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的順序是<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder.Append>，這個<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix>乘以指定的矩陣，以附加的順序。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event object.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件物件。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Creates three matrices.
trans-unit.target: 建立三個矩陣。

trans-unit.source: Lists the contents of matrix 1 to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 列出矩陣 1 至螢幕的內容。

trans-unit.source: Multiplies matrix 1 by matrix 2 and stores the result in matrix 1.
trans-unit.target: 矩陣 2 矩陣 1 並將結果儲存在矩陣 1。

trans-unit.source: Lists the contents of matrix 1 to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 列出矩陣 1 至螢幕的內容。

trans-unit.source: Multiplies the result stored in matrix 1 by matrix 3, and again stores the result in matrix 1.
trans-unit.target: 將結果儲存在矩陣矩陣 3，1，並再次將結果儲存在矩陣 1。

trans-unit.source: Lists the contents of matrix 1 to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 列出矩陣 1 至螢幕的內容。

trans-unit.source: Draws a rectangle to the screen prior to applying the matrix 1 transform (the blue rectangle).
trans-unit.target: 繪製矩形螢幕之前套用矩陣 1 轉換 （藍色矩形）。

trans-unit.source: Applies the transform to the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 將轉換套用至矩形。

trans-unit.source: Draws the transformed rectangle to the screen (the red rectangle), using the same coordinates as the previous rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 繪製轉換的矩形螢幕 （紅色矩形），使用相同的座標和先前的矩形。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the red rectangle has been scaled by a factor of two in the horizontal direction, then rotated 90 degrees, and then moved (translated) 250 points in the x direction and 50 points in the y direction.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，紅色矩形已調整過大小的兩個水平方向的比例然後旋轉 90 度，，然後再移 y 方向的 （轉換） 250 點 x 方向和 50 的點。

trans-unit.source: Gets the x translation value (the dx value, or the element in the third row and first column) of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> 的 x 轉換值 (dx 值或第三列第一欄中的項目)。

trans-unit.source: The x translation value of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> 的 x 轉換值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the y translation value (the dy value, or the element in the third row and second column) of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> 的 y 轉換值 (dy 值或第三列第二欄中的項目)。

trans-unit.source: The y translation value of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> 的 y 轉換值。

trans-unit.source: Resets this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> to have the elements of the identity matrix.
trans-unit.target: 重設這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> 使其具有身分識別矩陣的元素。

trans-unit.source: The elements on the main diagonal of the identity matrix are 1.
trans-unit.target: 主要身分識別矩陣的對角線上的項目都是 1。

trans-unit.source: All other elements of the identity matrix are 0.
trans-unit.target: 身分識別矩陣的所有其他項目為 0。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event object.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件物件。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Creates a scaling matrix.
trans-unit.target: 建立縮放矩陣。

trans-unit.source: Lists the matrix elements to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 列出矩陣元素至螢幕。

trans-unit.source: Resets the matrix to identity.
trans-unit.target: 重設識別矩陣。

trans-unit.source: Lists the elements to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 列出的項目至螢幕。

trans-unit.source: Translates the matrix by 50 points in the x-axis and 40 points in the y-axis.
trans-unit.target: 轉換矩陣的 50 點在 x 軸和 y 軸的 40 點。

trans-unit.source: Lists the elements of the translated matrix to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 列出要螢幕的轉譯矩陣的項目。

trans-unit.source: Draws a rectangle is drawn to the screen prior to applying the matrix transform (the blue rectangle).
trans-unit.target: 繪製矩形會繪製到螢幕之前套用矩陣轉換 （藍色矩形）。

trans-unit.source: Applies the transform to the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 將轉換套用至矩形。

trans-unit.source: Draws the transformed rectangle is drawn to the screen (the red rectangle), using the same coordinates as the previous rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 繪製轉換的矩形會繪製到螢幕 （紅色矩形），使用相同的座標和先前的矩形。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the red rectangle was not scaled (because of the reset) but was translated in the x-axis and y-axis.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，紅色矩形不會向外 （因為重設），但已轉譯的 x 軸和 y 軸。

trans-unit.source: Applies a clockwise rotation of the specified angle about the origin to this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" />.
trans-unit.target: 將繞著原點之指定角度的順時針旋轉套用至這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" />。

trans-unit.source: The angle of the rotation, in degrees.
trans-unit.target: 旋轉的角度 (單位為度數)。

trans-unit.source: Prepend to this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> a clockwise rotation, around the origin and by the specified angle.
trans-unit.target: 在原點為中心並以指定的角度，將順時針旋轉附加在這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> 前面。

trans-unit.source: For an example, see <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix.Rotate%28System.Single%2CSystem.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder%29>.
trans-unit.target: 如需範例，請參閱 <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix.Rotate%28System.Single%2CSystem.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder%29>。

trans-unit.source: The angle (extent) of the rotation, in degrees.
trans-unit.target: 旋轉的角度 (範圍)，單位為度數。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder" /> that specifies the order (append or prepend) in which the rotation is applied to this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder" />，指定將旋轉套用至這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> 的順序 (附加在後面或附加在前面)。

trans-unit.source: Applies a clockwise rotation of an amount specified in the <paramref name="angle" /> parameter, around the origin (zero x and y coordinates) for this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" />.
trans-unit.target: 以這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> 的原點 (X 座標和 Y 座標都為 0) 為中心，套用 <paramref name="angle" /> 參數中指定的順時針旋轉量。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event object.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件物件。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Draws a rectangle to the screen prior to applying a rotation transform (the blue rectangle).
trans-unit.target: 繪製矩形螢幕之前套用旋轉轉換 （藍色矩形）。

trans-unit.source: Creates a matrix and rotates it 45 degrees.
trans-unit.target: 建立矩陣，並將它旋轉 45 度。

trans-unit.source: Applies this matrix transform to the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 此矩陣轉換套用至矩形。

trans-unit.source: Draws the transformed rectangle to the screen (the red rectangle).
trans-unit.target: 將轉換的矩形繪製至畫面 （紅色矩形）。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the red rectangle has been rotated around the 0, 0 screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，紅色矩形有旋轉著 0，0 螢幕座標。

trans-unit.source: Applies a clockwise rotation about the specified point to this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> by prepending the rotation.
trans-unit.target: 藉由將旋轉附加在前面，將繞著指定點的順時針旋轉套用至這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" />。

trans-unit.source: The angle (extent) of the rotation, in degrees.
trans-unit.target: 旋轉的角度 (範圍)，單位為度數。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> that represents the center of the rotation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />，代表旋轉的中心。

trans-unit.source: Applies a clockwise rotation to this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> around the point specified in the <paramref name="point" /> parameter, and by prepending the rotation.
trans-unit.target: 藉由將旋轉附加在前面，繞著 <paramref name="point" /> 參數中所指定的點，將順時針旋轉套用至這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates using a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix> and the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.Transform%2A> method to rotate a string.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix>和<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.Transform%2A>旋轉字串的方法。

trans-unit.source: This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例被為了搭配 Windows Form。

trans-unit.source: Create a form and paste the following code into it.
trans-unit.target: 建立表單，並貼上下列程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Call the `DrawVerticalStringFromBottomUp` method in the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫`DrawVerticalStringFromBottomUp`方法在表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理常式，傳遞`e`為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: The angle of the rotation, in degrees.
trans-unit.target: 旋轉的角度 (單位為度數)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> that represents the center of the rotation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />，代表旋轉的中心。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder" /> that specifies the order (append or prepend) in which the rotation is applied.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder" />，指定套用旋轉的順序 (附加在後面或附加在前面)。

trans-unit.source: Applies a clockwise rotation about the specified point to this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> in the specified order.
trans-unit.target: 依據指定的順序，將繞著指定點的順時針旋轉套用至這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event object.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件物件。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Draws a rectangle to the screen prior to applying a rotation transform (the blue rectangle).
trans-unit.target: 繪製矩形螢幕之前套用旋轉轉換 （藍色矩形）。

trans-unit.source: Creates a matrix and rotates it 45 degrees around a specified point.
trans-unit.target: 建立矩陣，繞著指定點的 45 度旋轉。

trans-unit.source: Applies this matrix transform is to the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 適用於此矩陣轉換為矩形。

trans-unit.source: Draws the transformed rectangle to the screen (the red rectangle).
trans-unit.target: 將轉換的矩形繪製至畫面 （紅色矩形）。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the red rectangle has been rotated around the upper left-hand corner of the rectangle (the rotation point specified the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix.RotateAt%2A> method).
trans-unit.target: 請注意，紅色矩形旋轉過周圍的矩形左上角 (指定的旋轉點<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix.RotateAt%2A>方法)。

trans-unit.source: Applies the specified scale vector to this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> by prepending the scale vector.
trans-unit.target: 藉由將縮放向量附加在前面，將指定的縮放向量套用至這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" />。

trans-unit.source: The value by which to scale this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> in the x-axis direction.
trans-unit.target: 用來在 X 軸方向縮放這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: The value by which to scale this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> in the y-axis direction.
trans-unit.target: 用來在 Y 軸方向縮放這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: Applies the specified scale vector to this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> by prepending the scale vector.
trans-unit.target: 藉由將縮放向量附加在前面，將指定的縮放向量套用至這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" />。

trans-unit.source: For an example, see <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix.Scale%28System.Single%2CSystem.Single%2CSystem.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder%29>.
trans-unit.target: 如需範例，請參閱 <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix.Scale%28System.Single%2CSystem.Single%2CSystem.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder%29>。

trans-unit.source: The value by which to scale this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> in the x-axis direction.
trans-unit.target: 用來在 X 軸方向縮放這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: The value by which to scale this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> in the y-axis direction.
trans-unit.target: 用來在 Y 軸方向縮放這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder" /> that specifies the order (append or prepend) in which the scale vector is applied to this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder" />，指定將縮放向量套用至這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> 的順序 (附加在後面或附加在前面)。

trans-unit.source: Applies the specified scale vector (<paramref name="scaleX" /> and <paramref name="scaleY" />) to this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> using the specified order.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的順序，將指定的縮放向量 (<paramref name="scaleX" /> 與 <paramref name="scaleY" />) 套用至這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event object.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件物件。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Draws a rectangle to the screen prior to applying a scaling transform (the blue rectangle).
trans-unit.target: 繪製矩形螢幕之前套用縮放轉換 （藍色矩形）。

trans-unit.source: Creates a matrix and scales it by 3 in the x-axis and 2 in the y-axis.
trans-unit.target: 建立矩陣，並且縮放它 3 在 x 軸和 y 軸中的 2。

trans-unit.source: Applies this matrix transform to the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 此矩陣轉換套用至矩形。

trans-unit.source: Draws the transformed rectangle to the screen (the red rectangle).
trans-unit.target: 將轉換的矩形繪製至畫面 （紅色矩形）。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the red rectangle has been scaled by a factor of 3 in the x-axis and by 2 in the y-axis, including the upper left-hand corner of the rectangle (the beginning point of the rectangle).
trans-unit.target: 請注意，紅色矩形在 x 軸的 3 倍和 y 軸，包括 （矩形的開始點） 的矩形左上角中的 2 比例。

trans-unit.source: Applies the specified shear vector to this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> by prepending the shear vector.
trans-unit.target: 藉由將傾斜向量附加在前面，將指定的傾斜向量套用至這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" />。

trans-unit.source: The horizontal shear factor.
trans-unit.target: 水平傾斜因數。

trans-unit.source: The vertical shear factor.
trans-unit.target: 垂直傾斜因數。

trans-unit.source: Applies the specified shear vector to this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> by prepending the shear transformation.
trans-unit.target: 藉由將傾斜轉換附加在前面，將指定的傾斜向量套用至這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" />。

trans-unit.source: The transformation applied in this method is a pure shear only if one of the parameters is 0.
trans-unit.target: 轉換會在這個方法是純粹的傾斜只有其中一個參數是 0。

trans-unit.source: Applied to a rectangle at the origin, when the `shearY` factor is 0, the transformation moves the bottom edge horizontally by `shearX` times the height of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 套用至矩形原點，當`shearY`因素是 0，則轉換藉由水平移動的下邊緣`shearX`倍的矩形的高度。

trans-unit.source: When the `shearX` factor is 0, it moves the right edge vertically by `shearY` times the width of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 當`shearX`因素是 0，就會將移右邊緣垂直地`shearY`倍的矩形的寬度。

trans-unit.source: Caution is in order when both parameters are nonzero, because the results are hard to predict.
trans-unit.target: 充分的警告是在順序中，當兩個參數都為非零，因為預測的結果。

trans-unit.source: For example, if both factors are 1, the transformation is singular (hence noninvertible), squeezing the entire plane to a single line.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果這兩個因素都是 1，則轉換為單數 (因此逆轉)，並將整個平面成一行。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event object.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件物件。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following action:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Draws a rectangle to the screen, using a green pen, prior to applying a scaling transform.
trans-unit.target: 畫面上，使用綠色畫筆，在套用縮放轉換之前要繪製的矩形。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix> and uses it to set a world-coordinate transform for the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix>並使用它來設定全局座標轉換為<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>。

trans-unit.source: Draws another rectangle using a red pen.
trans-unit.target: 另一個使用繪製矩形紅色畫筆。

trans-unit.source: Draws an ellipse using a blue pen.
trans-unit.target: 繪製橢圓形使用藍色的畫筆。

trans-unit.source: The result is a green rectangle, a red parallelogram and a transformed, blue ellipse.
trans-unit.target: 結果會是綠色矩形、 紅色的平行四邊形和轉換的藍色橢圓形。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the green rectangle (drawn prior to setting the transform) directly uses the coordinates supplied in the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawRectangle%2A> call.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，綠色矩形 （繪製設定轉換之前） 直接使用所提供的座標<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawRectangle%2A>呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The other two figures are transformed prior to drawing.
trans-unit.target: 在 繪圖之前轉換兩個圖形。

trans-unit.source: The rectangle is transformed to a parallelogram (red), and the ellipse (blue) is transformed to fit into the transformed parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 矩形會轉換成 （紅色）、 平行四邊形和橢圓形 （藍色） 會轉換而無法放入已轉換的平行四邊形。

trans-unit.source: Notice the bottom of the rectangle is moved (sheared) in the x-axis by a factor of two times the height of the rectangle, thus forming the parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，矩形的底部移動 （分歧） 在 x 軸的兩倍的矩形的高度，因而形成平行四邊形。

trans-unit.source: The horizontal shear factor.
trans-unit.target: 水平傾斜因數。

trans-unit.source: The vertical shear factor.
trans-unit.target: 垂直傾斜因數。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder" /> that specifies the order (append or prepend) in which the shear is applied.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder" />，指定套用切變的順序 (附加在後面或附加在前面)。

trans-unit.source: Applies the specified shear vector to this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> in the specified order.
trans-unit.target: 依據指定的順序，將指定的傾斜向量套用至這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" />。

trans-unit.source: The transformation applied in this method is a pure shear only if one of the parameters is 0.
trans-unit.target: 轉換會在這個方法是純粹的傾斜只有其中一個參數是 0。

trans-unit.source: Applied to a rectangle at the origin, when the `shearY` factor is 0, the transformation moves the bottom edge horizontally by `shearX` times the height of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 套用至矩形原點，當`shearY`因素是 0，則轉換藉由水平移動的下邊緣`shearX`倍的矩形的高度。

trans-unit.source: When the `shearX` factor is 0, it moves the right edge vertically by `shearY` times the width of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 當`shearX`因素是 0，就會將移右邊緣垂直地`shearY`倍的矩形的寬度。

trans-unit.source: Caution is in order when both parameters are nonzero, because the results are hard to predict.
trans-unit.target: 充分的警告是在順序中，當兩個參數都為非零，因為預測的結果。

trans-unit.source: For example, if both factors are 1, the transformation is singular (hence noninvertible), squeezing the entire plane to a single line.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果這兩個因素都是 1，則轉換為單數 (因此逆轉)，並將整個平面成一行。

trans-unit.source: For an example, see <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix.Shear%28System.Single%2CSystem.Single%29>.
trans-unit.target: 如需範例，請參閱 <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix.Shear%28System.Single%2CSystem.Single%29>。

trans-unit.source: Applies the geometric transform this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> represents to an array of points.
trans-unit.target: 將這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> 表示的幾何轉換套用至點陣列。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> structures that represents the points to transform.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> 結構的陣列，這個陣列表示要轉換的點。

trans-unit.source: Applies the geometric transform represented by this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> to a specified array of points.
trans-unit.target: 將這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> 所表示的幾何轉換套用至指定的點陣列。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event object.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件物件。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Creates an array of points that form a rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 建立形成矩形的點陣列。

trans-unit.source: Draws this array of points (to the screen prior to applying a scaling transform (the blue rectangle).
trans-unit.target: 點陣列 （將繪製至畫面之前套用縮放轉換 （藍色矩形）。

trans-unit.source: Creates a matrix and scales it by 3 in the x-axis and 2 in the y-axis.
trans-unit.target: 建立矩陣，並且縮放它 3 在 x 軸和 y 軸中的 2。

trans-unit.source: Applies this matrix transform to the array of points.
trans-unit.target: 此矩陣會轉換套用至點陣列。

trans-unit.source: Draws the transformed array to the screen (the red rectangle).
trans-unit.target: 將轉換的陣列繪製到螢幕 （紅色矩形）。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the red rectangle has been scaled by a factor of 3 in the x-axis and by 2 in the y-axis, including the upper left-hand corner of the rectangle (the beginning point of the rectangle).
trans-unit.target: 請注意，紅色矩形在 x 軸的 3 倍和 y 軸，包括 （矩形的開始點） 的矩形左上角中的 2 比例。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structures that represents the points to transform.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> 結構的陣列，這個陣列表示要轉換的點。

trans-unit.source: Applies the geometric transform represented by this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> to a specified array of points.
trans-unit.target: 將這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> 所表示的幾何轉換套用至指定的點陣列。

trans-unit.source: For an example, see <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix.TransformPoints%28System.Drawing.Point%5B%5D%29>.
trans-unit.target: 如需範例，請參閱 <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix.TransformPoints%28System.Drawing.Point%5B%5D%29>。

trans-unit.source: Multiplies each vector in an array by the matrix.
trans-unit.target: 將陣列中的每個向量乘以矩陣。

trans-unit.source: The translation elements of this matrix (third row) are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 這個矩陣的轉換元素 (第三列) 會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> structures that represents the points to transform.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> 結構的陣列，這個陣列表示要轉換的點。

trans-unit.source: Applies only the scale and rotate components of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> to the specified array of points.
trans-unit.target: 只將這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> 的縮放和旋轉元件套用至指定的點陣列。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event object.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件物件。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Creates an array of points that form a rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 建立形成矩形的點陣列。

trans-unit.source: Draws this array of points to the screen prior to applying a scaling transform (the blue rectangle).
trans-unit.target: 將點陣列繪製到螢幕之前套用縮放轉換 （藍色矩形）。

trans-unit.source: Creates a matrix and scales it by 3 in the x-axis and 2 in the y-axis, and translates it by 100 in both axes.
trans-unit.target: 建立矩陣和縮放 3 在 x 軸和 y 軸，2，並將它轉換兩個軸的 100。

trans-unit.source: Lists the matrix elements to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 列出矩陣元素至螢幕。

trans-unit.source: Applies this matrix transform to the array of points.
trans-unit.target: 此矩陣會轉換套用至點陣列。

trans-unit.source: Draws the transformed array to the screen (the red rectangle).
trans-unit.target: 將轉換的陣列繪製到螢幕 （紅色矩形）。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the red rectangle has been scaled by a factor of 3 in the x-axis and by 2 in the y-axis, including the upper left-hand corner of the rectangle (the beginning point of the rectangle) but the translation vector (the last two elements of the matrix) is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，紅色矩形在 x 軸的 3 倍和 y 軸，包括 （矩形的開始點） 的矩形左上角中的 2 經過調整，但會忽略的轉譯向量 （矩陣的最後兩個項目）。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> structures that represents the points to transform.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> 結構的陣列，這個陣列表示要轉換的點。

trans-unit.source: Multiplies each vector in an array by the matrix.
trans-unit.target: 將陣列中的每個向量乘以矩陣。

trans-unit.source: The translation elements of this matrix (third row) are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 這個矩陣的轉換元素 (第三列) 會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: For an example, see <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix.TransformVectors%28System.Drawing.Point%5B%5D%29>.
trans-unit.target: 如需範例，請參閱 <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix.TransformVectors%28System.Drawing.Point%5B%5D%29>。

trans-unit.source: Applies the specified translation vector to this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> by prepending the translation vector.
trans-unit.target: 藉由將轉譯向量附加在前面，將指定的轉譯向量套用至這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" />。

trans-unit.source: The x value by which to translate this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" />.
trans-unit.target: 用來轉換這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> 的 x 值。

trans-unit.source: The y value by which to translate this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" />.
trans-unit.target: 用來轉換這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> 的 y 值。

trans-unit.source: Applies the specified translation vector (<paramref name="offsetX" /> and <paramref name="offsetY" />) to this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> by prepending the translation vector.
trans-unit.target: 藉由將轉譯向量附加在前面，將指定的轉譯向量 (<paramref name="offsetX" /> 與 <paramref name="offsetY" />) 套用至這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" />。

trans-unit.source: For an example, see <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix.Translate%28System.Single%2CSystem.Single%2CSystem.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder%29>.
trans-unit.target: 如需範例，請參閱 <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix.Translate%28System.Single%2CSystem.Single%2CSystem.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder%29>。

trans-unit.source: The x value by which to translate this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" />.
trans-unit.target: 用來轉換這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> 的 x 值。

trans-unit.source: The y value by which to translate this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" />.
trans-unit.target: 用來轉換這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> 的 y 值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder" /> that specifies the order (append or prepend) in which the translation is applied to this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder" />，指定將轉換套用至這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> 的順序 (附加在後面或附加在前面)。

trans-unit.source: Applies the specified translation vector to this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> in the specified order.
trans-unit.target: 依據指定的順序，將指定的轉譯向量套用至這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event object.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件物件。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Draws a rectangle to the screen prior to applying a translate transform (the blue rectangle).
trans-unit.target: 繪製矩形螢幕之前套用轉換轉換 （藍色矩形）。

trans-unit.source: Creates a matrix and translates it by 100 in both axes.
trans-unit.target: 建立矩陣，並將它轉換兩個軸的 100。

trans-unit.source: Applies this matrix transform to the rectangle,
trans-unit.target: 此矩陣轉換套用至矩形中，

trans-unit.source: Draws the transformed rectangle to the screen (the red rectangle).
trans-unit.target: 將轉換的矩形繪製至畫面 （紅色矩形）。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the beginning of the red rectangle is located 100 points in both axes from the beginning of the blue triangle.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，紅色矩形的開頭位於 100 點開頭的兩個座標軸中的藍色的三角形。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> structures that represents the points to transform.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> 結構的陣列，這個陣列表示要轉換的點。

trans-unit.source: Multiplies each vector in an array by the matrix.
trans-unit.target: 將陣列中的每個向量乘以矩陣。

trans-unit.source: The translation elements of this matrix (third row) are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 這個矩陣的轉換元素 (第三列) 會被忽略。
